Package Program_4

Class Controller

java.lang.Object
Program_4.Controller
public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
This class is the controller class and it takes care of event driven programming for the software system for ordering pizzas and included important action events such as adding order and showing order after customer chooses a specific customization of the pizza.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Controller()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void addToOrder()
    This method adds the order the customer decides to give based on the customization of their pizzas by adding to an arraylist that holds Pizza as an object as that is order of the customer.
    void addTopping()
    This method adds toppings to the Build Your Own pizzas and up to 6 different toppings for customers to chose from.
    void ChangeCombo()
    This method takes care of the combobox items by changing images based on the chosen pizza and gives a list of three different styles and sizes customers can chose from when giving an order.
    void initialize()
    This method just initializes the combobox and the list of toppings along with setting defualt values of style and size as Build Your Own and medium.
    void removeTopping()
    This method removes toppings from the Build Your Own pizza from the list view.
    void showOrder()
    This method opens up the second controller and outputs the items from the arraylist that holds the order the customer gave from addOrder() method.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • Controller

      public Controller()

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      This method just initializes the combobox and the list of toppings along with setting defualt values of style and size as Build Your Own and medium. This method also generates images from combobox.

    • ChangeCombo

      public void ChangeCombo()
      This method takes care of the combobox items by changing images based on the chosen pizza and gives a list of three different styles and sizes customers can chose from when giving an order.

    • removeTopping

      public void removeTopping()
      This method removes toppings from the Build Your Own pizza from the list view.

    • addToOrder

      public void addToOrder()
      This method adds the order the customer decides to give based on the customization of their pizzas by adding to an arraylist that holds Pizza as an object as that is order of the customer.

    • addTopping

      public void addTopping()
      This method adds toppings to the Build Your Own pizzas and up to 6 different toppings for customers to chose from.

    • showOrder

      public void showOrder()
      This method opens up the second controller and outputs the items from the arraylist that holds the order the customer gave from addOrder() method.
